REACT_APP_TILE_SHAPE.description: Video Tile Shape, takes values of format 1-2

REACT_APP_THEME.description: Light or Dark, takes value Ligth|Dark

REACT_APP_LOGO.description: Brand Logo, Take any image url

REACT_APP_FONT.description: Font to be used, Takes value Inter|Roboto|Lato|OpenSans|MontSerrat|IBMPlexSans

REACT_APP_SHOW_CHAT.description: Allow Chat or not, Takes value True|False

REACT_APP_SHOW_SCREENSHARE.description: Allow Screenshare or not , Takes value True|False

REACT_APP_TOKEN_GENERATION_ENDPOINT.description: API url where your 100ms token generation service is hosted
